author: Norman Cousins

text: I'm very comfortable with failure. I'm very comfortable being the guy who disappoints people.

text: All war represents a failure of diplomacy.

author: Madeleine M. Kunin

text: All human actions are equivalent and all are on principle doomed to failure.

text: Failure is always an option.

text: I grew up playing sports. There is a clear line between success and failure.

text: Never be afraid of failure. And don't stop yourself from doing something you want to do because of what others might think. Only you know yourself best.
